#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <algorithm>
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair

using namespace std;

int main(){
	int t;
	cin >> t;
	for(int cases=1; cases<=t; cases++){
		int k,m;
		vector< pair<int,int> > events;
		vector<int> cnt;
		cin >> k >> m;
		cnt.resize(k+1,0);
		for(int i=0;i<k;i++){
			int x,y;
			cin >> x >> y;
			events.pb(mp(x,-(i+1)));
			events.pb(mp(y,(i+1)));
		}
		sort(events.begin(),events.end());
		while(m--){
			int d;
			cin >> d;
			for(int i=0;i<d;i++){
				int x,y;
				cin >> x >> y;
				cnt[x] += y;
			}
		}
		int ans = 0, cur = 0;
		for(int i=0;i<events.size();i++){
			// cout << events[i].first << " " << events[i].second << " " << cnt[abs(events[i].second)] << endl;
			if(events[i].second < 0){
				cur += cnt[-events[i].second];
			}
			else cur -= cnt[events[i].second];
			ans = max(ans,cur);
		}
		cout << "Case " << cases << ": " << ans << "\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
